name: Party Games: 2 3 4 Player Game
description:
Have fun with duel your friends in a variety of 4 player minigames using simple one touch controls! Play simultaneously on the same device for multiplayer action on the road, wherever you are in offline game mode. Or invite your friends to a multiplayer game and play all mini-games online from anywhere in the world.
You can play with two players but if you have more friends or family around you can battle it out with three or four players.
You can also play offline games against the bot to improve your skills and become the best!

If looking for games online or games offline? Party Games just what you need!

=================================
TWELVE 4 PLAYER MINIGAMES TO PLAY
=================================
SOCCER
Do you have football skills to score a one touch goal football?

HIGHWAY
Mechanics of popular game about road jump, only now you can play together, threesome or four.

MEMORY
Popular memory test game, you need to find a pair.

TANKS
Duel each other on the battlefield. Challenge who’s the best shooter?

NON-STOP
Addictive endless runner which you have to jump and turn, so as not to fall into the water.

COLLAPSE
New logic game with chips and chain reaction. Here you must foresee every step.

DARTS
Fun darts for fun company. Target is spinning in a random direction and you need to score as many of your darts as possible.

SQUARES
Logical board game, also known as Boxes. You will need to draw lines to grab squares.

STACKS
Game of reaction, required to build a tower of rectangles as high as possible.

WATER KING
Variation of the king of the mountain, only on the water. Rules like in Sumo Wrestling, push your opponent and don’t get pushed over the line!

TIC-TAC-TOE
Classic tic-tac-toe mini-game, only on a large field and 2, 4 or 4 players.

RACES
Race for a short distance. Reach finishline first!

=======
FEATURES
=======
• Simple one touch or one button controls
• 4-players can play using the same device
• 4-players can play online games over Internet
• 4-players can play offline games over Bluetooth or Wi-Fi
• 12 different games
• Challenge your friends and family

Thank you for playing!
